description:
Shinobu Oshino realizes that humanity had turned into zombies thanks to the powers of Kiss-shot, the vampire that is the king of apparitions. Koyomi Araragi shoots up fireworks as an SOS signal, but instead they fall into the crisis of being surrounded by zombies. However, an unexpected individual arrives at the scene...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kabukimonogatari: Mayoi Jiang Shi Sono Yon
傾物語 まよいキョンシー 其ノ肆
